actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide that Federal reimbursement may be made with respect to certain treatment works, construction of which was initiated before October 18, 1972.

summary.text: Treatment Works Construction Reimbursement Amendment - Authorizes Federal reimbursement for a percentage of the costs of installing waste treatment works under construction before October 18, 1972 (now July 1, 1972). Requires applications for such reimbursement to be filed within six months of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide that Federal reimbursement may be made with respect to certain treatment works, construction of which was initiated before October 18, 1972.
